1.title: Last Hurrah

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: On their anniversary dinner Nat Cat suggests to Pauly they should go on a second honeymoon as their 'last hurrah' before starting a family.

2.title: A Full Load

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Nat Cat and Pauly indulge in a romantic second honeymoon. As they pack the car there is a heated debate on the advantages of a top loader washing machine versus a front loader.

3.title: Life Passions

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Nat Cat and Pauly reach their honeymoon destination and start things off with lunch and a discussion on what their life passions are.

4.title: Bike Rides

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Nat Cat and Pauly take a bike ride and get into a heated discussion on the Paleo Diet versus the five-two diet.

5.title: Naughty Time Again

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: As they read in bed, Nat Cat tries to initiate naughty time but it seems Pauly is a bit tired.

6.title: Sacrifices

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: On a picnic in the park, tensions rise as Nat Cat and Pauly realize the sacrifices they will need to make if they want to start a family.

7.title: The Last Night

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: On the final night of their second honeymoon, and after much prodding by Nat, it seems there might be some spontaneous naughty time for Nat Cat and Pauly.

8.title: The Next Five Year Plan Begins...

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Nat Cat and Pauly arrive home from their second Honeymoon to begin their next 5 year plan together. Will they start to try for a family?

1.title: Tackling the Big Issues of Domestic Life

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: We are introduced to Nat Cat and Pauly in their lovely home in the suburbs. Nat Cat has a big meeting at work. Pauly is supportive. They both agree a weekend visit to the Supercentre is needed to find an artwork for their living room.

2.title: Naughty Time

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Nat Cat and Pauly discuss the bills that need paying and schedule a date for 'naughty time'.

3.title: Dinner Plans

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Nat Cat calls Pauly while out jogging to try and sort out dinner only to discover he is watching TV and giving her the dreaded 'TV Voice'.

4.title: Dinner Conversations

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Pauly is upset to no longer be receiving his discount at work. Nat Cat tries to distract him with meal plans for their family BBQ on the weekend.

5.title: The Artwork

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Nat Cat and Pauly discuss what type of artwork should hang on their blank wall and we reveal Pauly's secret phobia of dolphins.

6.title: Where Is the Car?

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Nat Cat is making dinner when Pauly comes home wondering where her car is.

7.title: Heading to the Supercentre

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: It's the weekend and after a pump class at the gym, Nat Cat and Pauly make big plans to hit up the Supercentre before heading to a BBQ at Nat Cat's parent's place.

8.title: Parking at the Supercentre

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Nat Cat and Pauly search for a park at the Supercentre while discussing some of the pressing matters that are going on at Nat's work.

9.title: Art at the Supercentre

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Nat Cat and Pauly look for the perfect artwork in the art shop. It seems they have conflicting ideas on what would look best on the blank wall at home.

10.title: Do We Like the Artwork?

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: As Nat Cat and Pauly try to watch a DVD at home, Nat Cat raises questions about the artwork they have purchased. It seems she is having serious doubts about it.

11.title: A New Week

episode of.title: One Step Closer to Home (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: It's Monday morning and Pauly realizes that the new artwork is missing. Nat Cat reveals she removed it. Pauly agrees with Nat Cat's decision to keep the wall blank and they make plans to take the artwork back to the Supercentre.

imdb.plot outline: One Step Closer to Home is a satirical, bite-size online soap opera that follows the trials and tribulations, or lack thereof, of Nat and Paul Shaw, a young couple in the nesting phase: that awkward stage between the fun of 20s single-dom, and the settled domesticity of life with kids. In the thrilling ride of Season 1, Nat Cat and Pauly, as they are affectionately known to each other, traverse the volatile terrain of what to have for dinner, which print to buy from the supacentre and who's in charge of cheese and dips for Saturday's barbecue. Married life becomes very boring very quickly. In the midst of their hectic lives as newlyweds, even 'naughty time' takes a backseat.
imdb.title: One Step Closer to Home
plot: Nat Cat and Pauly Shaw face the big issues of domestic life.

In the thrilling ride of Season 1, Nat Cat and Pauly, as they are affectionately known to each other, traverse the volatile terrain of what to have for dinner, which print to buy from the supacentre and who's in charge of cheese and dips for Saturday's barbecue.
